name: .WMV File Extension
summary: Learn about .WMV files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a WMV file with various media players. In Windows, you can play a WMV video with the bundled Microsoft Media Player and Microsoft Movies & TV players.
Other applications that open WMV files in Windows, macOS, and Linux include VideoLAN VLC media player, Eltima Elmedia Player, and Kodi.

If you do not want to download a program to open a WMV file, you can upload it to Google Drive and view the video in a web browser. If you are a mobile user, you can open WMV files with J2 Interactive MX Player (Android), Videolabs VLC (Android), olimsoft OPlayer (iOS), and VideoLAN VLC for Mobile (iOS).
Several video conversion tools, including VideoLAN VLC media player, HandBrake, and Xilisoft Video Converter Ultimate, can convert WMV files to other formats.
